doc.title: Local Explorer
doc.plot: Wanna take the road trip less traveled? Local Explorer is young LA's anti-travel show, taking viewers on spur-of-the-moment itineraries that venture off-the-beaten path. The challenge? Roadworthy destinations just a five hour drive from LA. From Southern Cali nude beaches to the hazy holiday that is Burning Man, Local Explorer will give the geographically adventurous and the sofa surfers a raging travel bug. Local Explorer viewers know travel isn't about the destination - it's about the journey. On our spontaneous road trips, we'll offer viewers daredevil detours, informative travel tips and creative ways to make vacations accessible to everybody in LA.
